entry.def: A probationer is someone who has been found guilty of committing a crime but is on probation rather than in prison.
A probationer is someone who is still being trained to do a job and is on trial.

means.word_mean: 1. a nurse in training who is undergoing a trial period
2. someone released on probation or on parole
